message.body: Sorry, I don't have your number?
Grandpa pulling a fast one... I'll see what I can do! How are you?
Really exhausted - almost done with school and it's really intense
I'm good I can't wait to get on the road again. how are you
Minnesota for two weeks then more creating and working. Summer off though!
Listen to Sam Cooke singing Billie holiday when you feel exhausted
I had a really good record day Martha
I can't listen to tribute to a lady on spotify even though it's on there... :(
I'm going to send you a song and I want you to edit the words. I want the final the read "Skidmore/Stuckey"
I wrote it with you in mind.

The air is filled the silence is still left to take
The sweet susurrus whispers so as not to wake you up
The canvas and the painter head into the night The fingernail moon will lead the way They say. Oooooo

The cloudless night repeats its sermon to the sea
The water in the silence whispers, "I believe"
The painter takes his time, his Easel and his brush
an image from his mind begins to take

The darkest hour takes his bow, horizon wakes
the emptiness is still until the morning breaks
the paint, it has gone dry, the fever and the fire
and all that's left is gone but what remains
